info.title: Communal Platform API
info.description: API documentation for the Communal platform.

get.summary: List all digital member card delivery activities

parameters.name: filter[member_id]
parameters.description: Filter activities by the member ID belonging to the related user. Accepts alphanumeric strings.

parameters.name: filter[request_hash]
parameters.description: Filter activities by the unique request hash for tracing API requests.

parameters.name: filter[date_from]
parameters.description: Return activities created on or after the provided date. Format: ISO 8601 date/datetime (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: filter[date_to]
parameters.description: Return activities created on or before the provided date. Format: ISO 8601 date/datetime (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS).

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filter activities by delivery status. Supported values: `success`, `failed`.

post.description:
Sends a membership card via the email on file for the user. This method allows
configuration of which card types to send.

This endpoint can also be used to create
and update user specific data that will be used to generate the card. If an email supplied
is not found, a new user will be created with the additional data supplied.
post.summary: Send a membership card for a user

enum: Plan type could not be determined from given membership type.

post.summary: Archive or unarchive a membership type

get.summary: List all membership types in the system

get.description:
Returns a paginated list of programs. Registration opportunities (sessions) are
excluded by default for performance - use `?include=programs` to include them.

Returns detailed information about a specific program including
all configuration fields. Use `?include=programs` to include registration
opportunities (sessions) with pricing information.

Access rules:
- Requires show_participant_list enabled on the parent program
- Guests (unauthenticated): Can see counts only, no names
- Authenticated users: Can see sanitized names ("First L") and initials
get.summary: Get participant list for a parent program

200.description:
Authenticated user: return full sanitized participant data



Array of `ParticipantResource`

message.example: Participant list is not enabled for this program

get.description: Returns a paginated list of registration opportunities (programs) with optional filtering.

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Filter by status. Options: active, upcoming, past, ongoing, archived.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include related resources. Options: signups, parentProgram, prices, waitlistSignups.

id.description: Unique identifier for the form submission.

form_id.description: Reference to the form definition that was submitted.

user_id.description: ID of the authenticated user who submitted the form, null if submitted by a guest.

guest_id.description: ID of the guest who submitted the form, null if submitted by an authenticated user.

submission.description: JSON object containing all form field responses keyed by field identifier.

ip.description: IP address of the client that submitted the form.

updated_at.description: When this submission record was last updated.

form.description: The form definition this submission belongs to.

id.description: Unique identifier for the guest record.

guest_id.description: UUID used to identify guests across sessions before they become members.

email.description: Guest's email address used for communication and receipts.

name.description: Guest's full name as entered during checkout or registration.

first_name.description: First name extracted from the full name.

last_name.description: Last name extracted from the full name.

telephone.description: Guest's phone number for contact purposes.

address_two.description: Secondary address line (apartment, suite, unit, etc.).

created_at.description: When this guest record was created.

updated_at.description: When this guest record was last updated.

id.description: The ID of the membership type.

title.description: The title of the membership type.

description.description: The description of the membership type.

waivers.description: The waivers that are associated with the membership type.

plans.description: The plans that are associated with the membership type.

visibility_requires_base_membership.description: Whether this add-on should only be shown to members with its base membership.

id.description: Unique identifier for the parent program.

title.description: Display name of the parent program shown to users.

description.description: Detailed description of the parent program, may contain HTML.
examples: A collection of exciting summer sports programs for all ages.

event_start_date.description: When the program's events begin. All child programs run within this window.

event_end_date.description: When the program's events end. All child programs run within this window.

ongoing.description: Whether this is an ongoing program with no fixed end date.

status.description: Current status of the program (e.g., active, archived, draft).

dates.description: Human-readable formatted event date range for display.

registration_dates.description: Human-readable formatted registration date range for display.

is_event.description: Whether this parent program represents a single event rather than a program series.

draft.description: Whether this program is in draft mode and not yet published.

is_hidden.description: Whether this program is hidden from public listings.

profile_image.description: URL to the program's profile/header image.

updated_at.description: When this record was last updated.

deleted_at.description: When this record was soft deleted, null if not deleted.

archived_at.description: When this program was archived, null if not archived.

registration_opportunities.description: Child programs available for registration under this parent program.

id.description: Unique identifier for the parent program.

title.description: Display name of the parent program shown to users.

description.description: Detailed description of the parent program, may contain HTML.
examples: A collection of exciting summer sports programs for all ages.

event_start_date.description: When the program's events begin. All child programs run within this window.

event_end_date.description: When the program's events end. All child programs run within this window.

registration_start_date.description: When registration opens for this program. Users cannot sign up before this date.

registration_end_date.description: When registration closes for this program. Users cannot sign up after this date.

ongoing.description: Whether this is an ongoing program with no fixed end date.

status.description: Current status of the program (e.g., active, archived, draft).

dates.description: Human-readable formatted event date range for display.

registration_dates.description: Human-readable formatted registration date range for display.

is_event.description: Whether this parent program represents a single event rather than a program series.

draft.description: Whether this program is in draft mode and not yet published.

is_hidden.description: Whether this program is hidden from public listings.

profile_image.description: URL to the program's profile/header image.

updated_at.description: When this record was last updated.

deleted_at.description: When this record was soft deleted, null if not deleted.

archived_at.description: When this program was archived, null if not archived.

facilities.description: Facilities/locations where this program takes place.

registration_opportunities.description: Child programs available for registration under this parent program.

volunteerOpportunities.description: Volunteer opportunities associated with this parent program.

amount.description: The amount charged for the plan.

examples: A fun week-long basketball camp for ages 8-12.
A fun week-long basketball camp for ages 8-12.

items.description: By default, all card types ['apple', 'google', 'pdf'] will be used if not specified.

user.description:
User specific data that will stored on the user profile and used to generate the card. If not supplied during
this request, the data stored on the user profile will be used.

unique_identifier_key.description:
The unique identifier key for the user. This is used to identify the user in the system.
In the example below, the unique identifier key is "MemberID".

data.description:
Additional metadata that can be included with the user data.
Example of metadata keys (all in CapitalCase):
```
"MemberID": "123456",
"Active": true,
"LastName": "Smith",
"FirstName": "John",
"MiddleName": "Andrew",
"ExpiryDate": "12/31/2025",
"PreferredEmail": "john@smith.com",
"MemberCardLastUpdatedDateTime": "06/03/2025",
"MemberType": "Active"
```

id.description: Unique identifier for the subscription schedule.

stripe_schedule_id.description: Stripe's unique identifier for this subscription schedule.

status.description: Current status of the schedule (e.g., active, canceled, completed).

phases.description: Array of payment phases defining amounts and intervals for the payment plan.

start_date.description: When the first payment is due.

end_date.description: When the final payment is due and the schedule completes.

canceled_at.description: When this schedule was canceled, null if still active.

amount_paid.description: Total amount already paid toward this schedule.

title.description: Display title for this payment plan derived from the schedule config.

total_amount.description: Total amount due across all phases of the schedule.

subscription_id.description: Reference to the associated Stripe subscription.

updated_at.description: When this schedule was last updated.

subscription.description: The Stripe subscription associated with this schedule.

config.description: The configuration template used to create this schedule.

paymentsReceived.description: Transactions representing payments received for this schedule.

transaction_line_items.description: Minimal transaction line items (avoid Program appends)

name.description: The full name of the user (generated from first/last name).

first_name.description: The first name of the user.

last_name.description: The last name of the user.

middle_name.description: The middle name of the user.

preferred_name.description: The preferred name of the user.

email.description: A unique email address for the user.

profile_zip.description: The postal code or zip code of the user.

profile_state.description: The province or state of the user.

profile_address.description: The street address of the user.

profile_address_line_2.description: The second line of the address of the user.

profile_country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of the user.

telephone.description: A phone number for the user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the uploaded file.

name.description: Original filename as uploaded by the user.

public.description: Whether this file is publicly accessible without authentication.

public_url.description: Direct public URL to the file if it is marked as public.

signed_url.description: Temporary signed URL for secure access to private files.

signed_url_expires_at.description: When the signed URL expires and a new one must be generated.

updated_at.description: When this file record was last updated.

errors.description: A detailed description of each field that failed validation.
